this was probably one of the first movies that benefitted from internet piracy, when it came out more people saw it online, i know i did :D
Hi, how do you get the subtitles to work? I tried to winrar them but nothing seemed to work... I'm not sure what I'm supposed to do. Please help, thanks :)

@hughst1000
just open the movie with vlc and the subs should appear in the drop down menus

If you're having trouble with included subs, or you want to play movie in a player that don't support them, here's a perfectly matching subs:

http://subscene.com/princess-mononoke-mononoke-hime/subtitles-7210.aspx
Aim for the 2 dc subs, just as the videos in this torrent.

Thanks for the subs kumbandit,
.Bone's subs didnt work

Good quality audio/video 10/10

Had some minor stuttering issues playing it on the DVD player via my external USB Hard drive- however I dont think it was because of this file.

Subtitles included did NOT work- however I downloaded the one's that kumbandit linked and they did work (well- 98%, had some small issues with the "E" shown as "B" and "P" shown as "R" with our DVD player).

Awesome movie. I really enjoyed this. A must for anyone who enjoys animated movies. This is a tad violent/graphic at times though, so definitely not safe for young kids to watch. 13+ recommended.

V10

These subs are good but as the above comment says, there are a few parts in the movie where the letters a tiny bit mixed but very understandable nevertheless. Watch this movie.
